results.title: Tomorrow and Tomorrow and Tomorrow…
results.description: The Avengers are on trial for crime against the time stream with the Time Keepers judging and Immortus as their voice of defense.

items.name: Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (2002)
Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (Trade Paperback)

results.title: The Destiny War
results.description: As the Time Keepers prepare to wipe out thousands of divergent timelines, the Avengers, Kang, the Supreme Intelligence and Rick Jones attack. Libra awakens the Destiny Force in Rick again as an evil, divergent army of Avengers attacks. The Time Keepers kill Immortus. Captain Marvel exchanges places with an older Rick Jones and the two Ricks use the Destiny Force to call forth an equally good army of Avengers to the war.

items.name: Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (2002)
Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (Trade Paperback)

results.title: Fast Lane: Media Blitz (part 1 of 4)
results.description: Spider-Man fights Mysterio and has problems in his personal life.

items.name: Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (2002)
Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (Trade Paperback)

results.title: Avengers Assemble
results.description: As the war wages around them, Kang fights off the Time-Keepers who are trying to accelerate him into his Immortus incarnation, thereby ensuring their timeline. Rick sacrifices himself to destroy the Time-Keepers’ chrono-cannon. Captain America destroys the Forever Crystal, fearing its power to be too great. The armies of both divergent Avengers also disappear when the crystal is destroyed. Immortus is reborn, and Rick is saved when the Supreme Intelligence bonds him and Captain Marvel again. Finally, all the heroes are returned to their proper place and times. The Supreme Intelligence is also returned to captivity, in possession the reformed Forever Crystal, unbeknownst to everyone else.

items.name: Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (2002)
Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (Trade Paperback)

results.title: Now Is The Time For All Good Men…
results.description: After the Avengers route Immortus’ army, they compare notes as to who they are and why they were picked on this mission.  They find, however, that there are more questions than answers.

items.name: Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (2002)
Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (Trade Paperback)

results.title: City At The Heart Of Forever
results.description: As the time-tossed Avengers battle Immortus’ army, they are given refuge in Kang’s Chronopolis, a city of time. They escape the overwhelming odds in Kang’s time ship at the last second before Chronopolis is destroyed. The city's energies then coalesce into the Forever Crystal, a powerful time artifact.

items.name: Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (2002)
Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (Trade Paperback)

results.title: Running Out of Time
results.description: While taking refuge in the time machine, the Avengers pick up 3 time anomalies and decide to split their forces and investigate them. Yellowjacket, Hawkeye and Songbird go to  Tombstome in the old west; Captain Marvel and the Wasp journey to  the 1950s; and Giant Man and Captain America journey to the future. For his own safety, Rick stays in the time machine.

items.name: Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (2002)
Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (Trade Paperback)

results.title: Past Imperfect… Future Tense!
results.description: Rick watches from the time ship as all three Avengers squads deal with their time anomalies. Using the Forever Crystal, Immortus destroys the 1950s Avengers timeline just as Wasp and Captain Marvel escape back to the ship.

items.name: Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (2002)
Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (Trade Paperback)

results.title: In the Meantime, The In-Between Times…
results.description: As they finish their endeavors, the Avengers regroup , compare notes, and decide to take the battle to Immortus himself.

items.name: Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (2002)
Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (Trade Paperback)

results.title: Into a Limbo Large and Broad
results.description: The Avengers take on Immortus at his home base, but find that nothing is what appears to be in Limbo.

items.name: Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (2002)
Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (Trade Paperback)

results.title: The Secret History of The Avengers
results.description: The one Space Phantom the Avengers have fought over the years lays out their manipulation --as a team and as individuals-- by Immortus.

items.name: Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (2002)
Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (Trade Paperback)

results.title: Break: Reflections of the Conqueror
results.description: Kang reflects on his life, the decisions he’s made, his foes and his goals.

Avengers Legends Vol. I: Avengers Forever (Trade Paperback)

results.title: Not One of Us
results.description: David shows up Wolverine on his first day at class; The core of the new New Mutants begins to emerge; While trying to see her estranged father, Sofia and her friends are ambushed by the new Reavers.

items.name: Marvel Masterworks: The Inhumans Vol. 1 (2009 - Present)
Marvel Masterworks: The Inhumans Vol.1 (2009 - Present)
Marvel Masterworks: The Inhumans Vol.1 (2009 - Present)

results.title: (Just Like) Starting Over
results.description: After a brutal encounter with the Reavers, Kevin freaks out and decides to leave the school; Dani also questions her role as a teacher and prepares to leave but her students convince her to say; Josh, a Reaver who turns out to be a mutant during the battle, comes to Xaviers for help when he is driven from his home and is moved in with David.

items.name: Marvel Masterworks: The Inhumans Vol.1 (2009 - Present)

results.title: The Ties That Bind Part 3
results.description: Rhane, powerless but with a new attitude, returns to Xavier's just in time to help track down a new mutant whose electricity powers are out of control.
